page.title: 14PUPIL INTERVIEW-14yrs (cont)
page.content: computer rooms,videos,televisions and a weather hut for geography. Most of the pupils live by the sea so a lot of them do water sports out of school.These include canoeing,wind surfing and swimming in the sea.Other activities are going to the roller and ice-rinks,playing tennis on the courts provided at the sea front and playing in the amusements. Many pupils live in large terraced houses with a lot of rooms.The majority have front and back gardens and a garage. During the school holidays most families go abroad and some own cottages in the country.Others stay at home and make the most of the weather. Most pupils thought that their most memorable experience was getting on school teams.
